Combat Simulator Project Theater layout tool, version %(VERSION)s, built %(DATE)s

To run this tool it is recommended that you have at least a 1 GHz CPU, 512 MB
of ram, and a modern 3D accelerated graphics card (GF4 equivalent or better).

Enjoy!
